title: Button, mid-19th century
creditline: Gift of Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt
description:
Circular button, convex (with flattened top), tin back and brass shank.  Button is made of a disc of carved bone showing a dog lying down.  On reverse: "Extra fein."

On card 40

tombstone.epitaph:
Button, mid-19th century.
mid-19th century. bone, brass, tin, copper. Gift of Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt. 1925-2-410-b.
